mapper.insert: insert into dict_process_item_unit (id, unit_code, unit_name, unit_name_en, sort) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{unitCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=REAL})

insert into dict_process_item_unit
id,
unit_code,
unit_name,
unit_name_en,
sort,

mapper.update:
update dict_process_item_unit

unit_name = #{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit_name_en = #{unitNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=REAL},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT unit_code as code ,unit_name as name from dict_process_item_unit where company_id = #{company_id} order by id ASC
